instructions.title: General Instructions
details: Read all questions carefully before answering.
You are not allowed to leave the examination hall during the first and last 30 minutes.
Ensure that all personal belongings are placed in the designated area.
Using mobile phones or any electronic devices is prohibited.

instructions.title: Answer Sheet Instructions
details: Write your name and roll number clearly on the answer sheet.
Use a black or blue pen for writing answers.
Answer all questions in the space provided in the answer booklet.
Do not use correction fluid or erasers excessively.

instructions.title: Submission Instructions
details: Make sure to check your answers before submitting.
Ensure that your answer sheet is complete and signed by the invigilator before submission.
Hand over the question paper and answer sheet to the invigilator once the exam is over.
